meanings.definition: Confined to bed due to illness or disability.
meanings.sent1: The bedridden patient was unable to get up and walk around.
meanings.sent2: My grandmother has been bedridden for weeks after her surgery.
meanings.sent3: The bedridden cat refused to leave its cozy spot on the bed.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was free to wander even though her body remained bedridden.
meanings.sent5: The doctor's orders were clear - she must remain bedridden until further notice.

meanings.definition: Unable to leave one's bed due to physical weakness or injury.
meanings.sent1: He felt frustrated being bedridden and unable to do his usual activities.
meanings.sent2: The athlete was bedridden after a serious sports injury.
meanings.sent3: The bedridden puppy wagged its tail happily when its owner visited.
meanings.sent4: Despite being bedridden, her spirit remained strong and hopeful.
meanings.sent5: The storm left many people bedridden with injuries, waiting for help to arrive.
